title: Wholemeal ginger date and walnut loaf
ingredients: ['1 knob margarine', '150ml hot water', '200g dates, pitted and coarsely chopped', '75g crushed walnuts', '2 eggs', 'honey to taste', '1 teaspoon almond extract', '200g wholemeal self-raising flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '100g caster sugar (or equivalent SplendaÂ®)', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '4 tablespoons ginger preserves']
